issue.title: [R] Update cross-package documentation links
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9141](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9141). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
R has added a new --as-cran check in the development version, which is causing our nightly as-cran builds to fail. Regenerating the man pages with https://github.com/r-lib/roxygen2/pull/1109 will fix it.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9141?focusedCommentId=17137885) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
Issue resolved by pull request 7453
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/7453>
